::: {.callout-note}
## Exam Format
This course will end with an **oral exam** of **30 minutes** duration. The exams will be held at after the end of the course during the reading period and the week after.
:::

::: {.callout-important}
## Exam Eligibility
There are no preconditions for taking the exam.
:::
